agency_name: Department of Small Business and Supplier Diversity
series_description: This series documents the division's fiscal control of direct loans, financing assistance programs, and allocation for development bond issues. This series may include, but is not limited to, disbursement and payment information, statements, and deposit slips.
retention_statement: 5 Years after end of state fiscal year

agency_name: Department of Small Business and Supplier Diversity
series_title: Loans, Financing Assistance, and Bond Allocation Approved
series_description: This series documents the receipt, review, and approval of applications for loans, financing assistance, and/or industrial development bond allocations. This series may include, but is not limited to, applications, correspondence, and financial/personal data.
retention_statement: 5 Years after end of state fiscal year

agency_name: Department of Small Business and Supplier Diversity
series_title: Loans, Financing Assistance, and Bond Allocation Declined
series_description: This series documents the receipt, review, and disapproval of applications for loans, financing assistance, and/or industrial development bond allocations. This series may include, but is not limited to, applications, correspondence, and financial/personal data.
retention_statement: 5 Years after end of state fiscal year

agency_name: Department of Small Business and Supplier Diversity
series_title: Loans, Financing Assistance, and Bond Allocation Incomplete or Withdrawn
series_description: This series documents the review of applications received for loans, financing assistance, and/or industrial development allocations that were determined to be incomplete or were withdrawn. This series may include, but is not limited to, applications, correspondence, and financial/personal data.
retention_statement: 1 Year after end of state fiscal year
